content.html: If you can’t be concretely helpful to people who’ve lost their jobs, it’s best to STFU rather than resort to these sort of bromides. Try telling this to someone from India stuck in the green card queue for 15 years or someone who has a mortgage and 3 children to care for.
content.value:
If you can’t be concretely helpful to people who’ve lost their jobs, it’s best to STFU rather than resort to these sort of bromides.

Try telling this to someone from India stuck in the green card queue for 15 years or someone who has a mortgage and 3 children to care for.
